input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to impress the headmaster (sims 2)?
input_text.Response A:
Call the headmaster, and be sure your Sims do not have anybody coming over or anywhere to be when he arrives, and try to arrange parties and other fun social activities on ANOTHER DAY.
Have a clean house!
Make sure your Sims themselves are well and prepared.
Prepare.
Lastly, if you are having trouble multitasking in order to be ready for the big man to come to your house, PAUSE THE GAME AND TAKE AWHILE TO STOP AND THINK.
and to get yourself ten extra points make him go in the spa and drink coffee.
If you don't want to do this the old fashion way...cheat.
input_text.Response B: Sure! There are several different ways to do this, but the best one is to complete all of the school activities that he assigns to you. These are things like getting good grades, excelling at sports, and participating in extracurricular activities. Completing these tasks will earn you the respect of the headmaster, and help you to be successful in school.

label_annotations.feedback: Response B misses out that the question was relating to the game Sims 2.
